articles.title: Don't Miss: Leonid Meteor Shower Peak & Saturn in “The Sea” - SciTechDaily

articles.content:

articles.title: The Google Pixel 8 Pro's manual shutter speed is excellent... in some conditions - Android Authority
articles.description: The Google Pixel 8 Pro adds manual controls that let you specify the shutter speed of your pics. Does that allow you to take better pics? We tested it.
articles.content: One of the new features introduced with the Google Pixel 8 Pro is a manual camera mode that lets you control (almost) all aspects of your photos. Pixel phones are usually foolproof cameras so theres … [+6733 chars]
